docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: show
examples:
GET /api/settings/333972760
200
{
  "setting": {
    "name": "administrator",
    "value": "root@some.host.fqdn",
    "id": 333972760,
    "description": "The Default administrator email address",
    "updated_at": "2012-12-18T15:24:43Z",
    "category": "General",
    "settings_type": null,
    "default": "root@some.host.fqdn",
    "created_at": "2012-12-18T15:24:43Z"
  }
}

methods.name: update
